title.en-us: Verify geolocation token is cleared when exiting private browsing

description_rendered.en-us:
Steps

  1. Start Firefox with a new profile
  2. Enter into private browsing mode by going to Tools | Start Private Browsing
  3. Visit http://people.mozilla.org/~dougt/geo.html and select the "Share Location" button to do a geolocation request
  4. Exit private browsing mode by going to Tools | Stop Private Browsing
  5. Type about:config in a new tab
  6. Filter "geo.wifi.access_token"

Expected Result

Ensure that nothing is in preferences after Step 6.

description_raw.en-us:
Steps
-----

1. Start Firefox with a  new profile
2. Enter into private browsing mode by going to Tools | Start Private Browsing
3. Visit <http://people.mozilla.org/~dougt/geo.html> and select the "Share Location" button to do a geolocation request
4. Exit private browsing mode by going to Tools | Stop Private Browsing
5. Type about:config in a new tab
6. Filter "geo.wifi.access_token"


Expected Result
---------------

Ensure that nothing is in preferences after Step 6.
